channel.title: Comentarios en: ¿Qué hacer ante una crisis epiléptica?
channel.description: Logopeda en Valencia de adultos, niños y niñas con alteraciones del lenguaje, habla o voz.

item.title: Por: http://www.sorethumbsblog.com/
item.dc:creator: http://www.sorethumbsblog.com/
item.description: Thank you JoV! The two reasons i started this blog were- everytime I read a book, I feel the need to talk about it, even if it is to myself, and to make new friends who think and read like me.Please follow the blog, so that you can read whenever I post, and we can have discussions about our reviews. That would be awesome! Thank you!
item.content:encoded: Thank you JoV! The two reasons i started this blog were- everytime I read a book, I feel the need to talk about it, even if it is to myself, and to make new friends who think and read like me.Please follow the blog, so that you can read whenever I post, and we can have discussions about our reviews. That would be awesome! Thank you!

item.title: Por: Borozo
item.dc:creator: Borozo
item.description: admirable!!! yo tengo 2 nif1as y el dia no me alcanza para todo lo que tengo que hacer!!! muahcs veces me provoca sentarme a llorar!! aunque tengo un esposo colaborador, no es suficiente, ya quisiera tener una sra. de la limpieza, asi descansareda un poco.. nada es perfecto, solo nosotras jejeje
